message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you right now.
Let's split it more fairly, 55 for me, 45 for you.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  I'll take a little less this round, $55, but we need to settle this before inflation eats our profits.
I'll meet you closer to the middle. 52 for me, 48 for you. Inflation is hurting both of us.
